thread.title: 50 Cent gets flashy with his cash
thread.title_full: 50 Cent gets flashy with his cash

title: 50 Cent gets flashy with his cash
text:
50 Cent gets flashy with his cash 50 Cent gets flashy with his cash Share 
50 Cent has shown off his fortune in a series of online photos. 
The rapper, real name Curtis James Jackson III, filed for bankruptcy in July, but proved he had more money to his name on Instagram. 
In one photo, he spelt out the word “Broke” in bills, with some 100 US dollar bills visible. 
“Man this lunch money,I gotta go to work I’m still up, no Sleep at all. NEW MUSIC this week, Off The KANAN tape,” he wrote alongside the picture. 
Another shot showed the 40-year-old hip-hop star lying on a bed eating an ice lolly, surrounded by wads of cash, while he also posted a video of him laying underneath a pile of bills. 
“Cold in my eyes, ashy knuckles…I hustle so hard, I can’t see me legs. LMAO SOUTHSIDE ALL DAY LETS…” he captioned the footage. 
Fiddy also appeared to have splashed out on a new miniature car for his son. 
The rapper, who is surely showing off his sense of humour to those questioning his wealth, filed bankruptcy proceedings in July after losing a multi-million dollar lawsuit and has completed a court-ordered debt course. 50 Cent in court (Jefferson Siegel/AP) 
He told a court that his fortune wasn’t half as high as people presumed and admitted to exaggerating his affluent lifestyle. 
His boasts about his fortunes come after he dropped the price of his Connecticut mansion again. Share article 
The 50,000-square foot home in Farmington, with 21 bedrooms and 25 bathrooms, is now being listed for sale priced 8.5 million dollars – 10 million dollars down from its original asking price of 18.5 million in 2007. Promoted Stories
